name: updateUserDefinedTag
description: Update the value of a user-defined resource tag.

id.description: ID of the user-defined resource tag.

$block: Provides the details for a user-defined resource tag, which tags cloud compute resources created by CloudOn and CloudOut.

$ul: **id**: The ID of the resource tag.
**key**: The key of the resource tag.
**lastUpdateTime**: A timestamp (in UTC) that indicates when the resource tag was last updated.
**scopeRefId**: The ID of the archival location associated with the resource that has the specified user-defined resource tag.
**value**: The value of the resource tag.
